Detailed Description

Screen update (refresh) system, and some SDL-specific graphic functions.

Define Documentation

#define VIDEO_LINE_WIDTH   (Screen_SDL->pitch)

This is the number of bytes in a video line for the current mode.

On many platforms it will be the video mode's width (in pixels), rounded up to be a multiple of 4.

void Clear_border ( byte  color  ) 

Clears the parts of screen that are outside of the editing area.

There is such area only if the screen mode is not a multiple of the pixel size, eg: 3x3 pixels in 1024x768 leaves 1 column on the right, 0 rows on bottom.

References Pixel_height, Pixel_width, Screen_height, Screen_SDL, and Screen_width.

Referenced by Compute_optimal_menu_colors(), Init_mode_video(), and Remap_screen_after_menu_colors_change().
